changelog: Expanded weapons system with costs and mechanical effects. Removed duplicate Poison ability (use Venom). Removed duplicate Explosive weapon property (use Blast). Updated Boardwalk Blitzer ability.

abilities.name: Aim
abilities.effect: This unit may sacrifice movement to gain +1 die on its next ranged attack. Declare before rolling.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.effect: May deploy hidden. Reveal at any time to gain first strike in melee

abilities.name: Anchor
abilities.effect: Cannot be moved by enemy abilities or effects. Ignores knockback and displacement

abilities.name: Assistant
abilities.effect: May assist adjacent Mystic or Scientist with special activations

abilities.name: Audio Suppression
abilities.effect: Enemies within 6" suffer -1 to Morale checks

abilities.name: Authority
abilities.effect: Friendly units within 6" ignore Suppression effects

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.effect: When attacking a target that is already engaged with another friendly unit, this unit deals +1 damage on successful hits.

abilities.name: Barely Controlled
abilities.effect: At the start of its activation, this unit must move at least 6". If it cannot, or chooses not to, it must pass a Quality test or immediately Crash Land.

abilities.name: Befriend
abilities.effect: Action. A Ranger may attempt to Befriend a neutral or uncontrolled creature they are trained to interact with (based on Monster Type). Target must be in base contact. Make an opposed Quality check: both Ranger and creature roll a number of dice equal to their current Quality; each 4+ is a success. If the Ranger scores more successes, the creature becomes Befriended. If the creature scores more successes, the attempt fails with no effect. On a tie, the creature becomes Wary. Befriended creatures will not attack Rangers and may be escorted within 6". Befriended creatures never fight for Rangers unless explicitly stated. Some scenarios award Victory Points for escorting Befriended creatures to extraction. Peerless creatures follow their own rules and may not be Befriended unless explicitly stated.

abilities.name: Befriend Automat
abilities.effect: May attempt Befriend actions against Automat constructs. Success enables control or neutrality per scenario rules.

abilities.name: Befriend Beasts
abilities.effect: May attempt Befriend actions against Beasts. Successful Befriend prevents hostility per scenario rules.

abilities.name: Befriend Bloodless
abilities.effect: May attempt Befriend actions against Bloodless (undead). Successful Befriend alters hostility per scenario rules.

abilities.name: Befriend Kaiju
abilities.effect: May attempt Befriend actions against Kaiju-class monsters. Success calms or redirects per scenario rules.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.effect: At the start of its activation, this model must move as directly as possible toward the nearest visible enemy model, if able. While Berserk: Gain +1 die on melee attacks. Cannot take Interact actions.

abilities.name: Binding Rig
abilities.effect: On successful Grapple vs Brute or Monster type: target becomes Restrained (cannot move or attack until adjacent ally breaks restraints or this unit dies)

abilities.name: Bite the Bullet
abilities.effect: Once per game, after this unit resolves an Attack or Interact action, it may immediately take one additional action. After the second action resolves, this unit loses 1 Quality.

abilities.name: Blast
abilities.effect: Area of effect attack. Roll separately for each model in blast radius. See weapon for specific radius.

abilities.name: Blinkshift
abilities.effect: Twice per game, this unit may teleport instead of moving normally. Roll 3d6" and place the unit anywhere within that distance, ignoring terrain and units. The unit must have line of sight to the destination. On a roll of three 1s, the unit suffers 1 Strain and loses the Blinkshift ability for the rest of the game.

abilities.name: Blood in the Air
abilities.effect: When any model within 4" is reduced to 0 Quality, this model gains +1 die on its next attack.

abilities.name: Bloodless
abilities.effect: Immune to Poison and Blood in the Air effects. Cannot be targeted by abilities that specifically affect living creatures.

abilities.name: Boardwalk Blitzer
abilities.effect: Moves at double speed on boardwalks. After moving on a boardwalk, may immediately take one additional action (attack or interact).

abilities.name: Brace
abilities.effect: May sacrifice movement to gain +1 Defense until next activation

abilities.name: Brain Bloom
abilities.effect: Ranged mind attack that ignores cover bonuses. Apply Morale pressure first where applicable.

abilities.name: Brutal Blow
abilities.effect: Each successful melee hit deals +1 damage

abilities.name: Cargo Hold
abilities.effect: May transport up to 4 Rangers OR 1 medium Monster OR 2 objectives. Load/unload requires base contact and one activation.

abilities.name: Choking Dust
abilities.effect: If this unit's attack hits but deals no damage, target becomes Suppressed until end of its next activation. On natural 6 to hit, Suppressed extends by one additional activation.

abilities.name: Climber
abilities.effect: May climb vertical surfaces, 1 floor per round. Ignores height penalties for movement

abilities.name: Corrode
abilities.effect: On successful melee hit: If target has Mechan flag or is mechanical construct (Iron Golem, Iron Diplomat, etc.), deal 1 automatic damage in addition to normal attack. Otherwise, against targets with metal equipment, choose one - Remove 1 weapon property OR reduce target's Defense by 1 (permanent, minimum 0). Does not affect natural weapons (claws, fangs, etc.) or non-metallic armor. Corroded equipment and mechanical damage can be repaired using REPAIR ability.

abilities.name: Crash Landing
abilities.effect: When this unit fails Barely Controlled or is destroyed while Flying, place the model on the table. All units within 3" suffer 1 automatic hit and are Pinned.

abilities.name: Cut and Run
abilities.effect: When targeted by an attack (before dice are rolled), this model may immediately move up to 3". If it does, it drops any carried item at its original location.

abilities.name: Darting Attack
abilities.effect: After shooting, may move up to 3" even if already moved this activation

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.effect: Once per game, this unit may reroll all missed dice on a single ranged attack. Record that this ability was used..

abilities.name: Demolition
abilities.effect: Deals double damage to structures and terrain features.

abilities.name: Desperate Push
abilities.effect: This model may attempt an action even if it would normally be forbidden (Pinned, Suppressed, or at 0 Move). Roll as normal. If the roll produces no successes, this model loses 1 additional Quality.

abilities.name: Dread
abilities.effect: Enemies within 6" suffer -1 to Morale checks

abilities.name: Down the Hatch
abilities.effect: Titan. This unit can swallow another unit whole if it exceeds the target's Defense by 4 or more during a melee attack. The swallowed unit must be reasonably sized (no vehicles or other Titans). The swallowed unit is immediately killed and removed from play.

abilities.name: Extraction Priority
abilities.effect: If this unit exits the table while carrying an objective or Thyr crystal, gain +2 VP (in addition to objective value).

abilities.name: Fast
abilities.effect: +2" to base movement

abilities.name: Fear 1
abilities.effect: Enemies treat this unit as causing one additional Morale Loss

abilities.name: Fear 2
abilities.effect: Enemies treat this unit as causing two additional Morale Loss

abilities.name: Fear 3
abilities.effect: Enemies treat this unit as causing three additional Morale Loss

abilities.name: Fearless
abilities.effect: Automatically passes all Morale checks. Immune to Fear effects.

abilities.name: Field Patch Job
abilities.effect: Adjacent DEVICE or VEHICLE regains 2 Quality (once per activation). Requires Spare Parts, which are consumed.

abilities.name: Flechette Drop
abilities.effect: Attack. Once per activation while Flying, place a 6" diameter circle anywhere this unit moved over this activation. All units inside suffer a ranged attack roll. Cover does not apply.

abilities.name: Flying
abilities.effect: This unit ignores terrain while moving and may move over units and obstacles. Cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker also has Flying or a rule that allows it. Unit's Move is considered Flying.

abilities.name: Furious
abilities.effect: If this model has lost any Quality, it gains +1 die on its next melee attack. This bonus is cleared after the attack is resolved.

abilities.name: Gas Mask
abilities.effect: This unit ignores Coffin Cough, Choking Dust effects and other environmental gas/smoke/toxic effects to lungs and eyes as determined by scenario rules.

abilities.name: Grapple
abilities.effect: On hit, pull target 3-6" toward this unit. Target may not move next activation.

abilities.name: Grunt
abilities.effect: Expendable unit type. See Expendable Fodder in Type Rules for full effects.

abilities.name: Hero
abilities.effect: May reroll one failed action per activation

abilities.name: Heroic Grit
abilities.effect: Once per game: ignore first wound suffered

abilities.name: Hell Spray
abilities.effect: Attack. Three times per game, this unit may unleash a cone attack instead of a normal attack. Place a 12" long, 12" wide cone template from this unit's facing. All units whose bases are partially or fully within the cone are targeted. Roll this unit's Quality as a ranged attack against each target separately. The attack type (fire, ice, acid, poison gas, etc.) must be specified in the unit's profile.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.effect: On successful hit, target suffers -1 Quality until end of its next activation

abilities.name: Hold It Together
abilities.effect: When this model would test Morale, it may skip the test. If it does, it loses 1 Quality after the current activation. May not reduce Quality below 3+.

abilities.name: Immobile
abilities.effect: Cannot move. Gains +1 Defense when attacked

abilities.name: Impact 1
abilities.effect: When charging into melee, deals 1 automatic hit before normal attack rolls

abilities.name: Impact 2
abilities.effect: When charging, deals 2 automatic hits before combat begins

abilities.name: Impact 3
abilities.effect: When charging, deals 3 automatic hits before combat begins

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.effect: Friendly units within 6" gain +1 to Morale checks

abilities.name: Interact
abilities.effect: Can interact with objectives and terrain features. Required to contest or control objectives

abilities.name: Kick the Machine
abilities.effect: Adjacent friendly unit: Remove one debuff (Hex, Stagger, Suppression, Pinned)

abilities.name: Leaper
abilities.effect: Instead of normal movement, this unit may leap 2d6" in any direction, ignoring terrain and units. It can leap over or onto 1-story buildings or similar obstacles. On a roll of double 1s (snake eyes), the unit pulls a muscle: it loses the Leaper ability for the rest of the game and immediately suffers 1 Quality damage.

abilities.name: Load and Carry
abilities.effect: May pick up and carry objectives, Thyr crystals, or Spare Parts without penalty. Move speed unaffected.

abilities.name: Mark Target
abilities.effect: Once per game: Choose one enemy within LoS. That target takes +1 damage from all sources until end of round.

abilities.name: Mismanaged Asset
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed before Round 4, your faction loses 5 Victory Points

abilities.name: Mobile Cell Block
abilities.effect: Functions as Cargo Hold, but can hold arrested units (Restrained by Binding Rig). When this vehicle extracts off-table with prisoners, score VP equal to prisoners' combined point cost ÷ 10.

abilities.name: Mobile Cover
abilities.effect: Adjacent friendlies gain +1 Defense vs ranged attacks

abilities.name: Mobile Dynamo
abilities.effect: Projects 12" Electromagik field. Hexan and Jäger within field may use abilities. Moving reduces this turn's field to 6". Counts as Dynamo Generator for Electromagik dependency

abilities.name: Monster and Device
abilities.effect: This unit counts as both MONSTER and DEVICE type for abilities, upgrades, and targeting purposes

abilities.name: Mystic
abilities.effect: Unit type with access to mystical abilities and Unleashed Power power

abilities.name: Not Yet.
abilities.effect: The first time per round this unit would be reduced to 0 Quality, it remains at 1 Quality instead. At the end of its next activation, this unit is destroyed.

abilities.name: Overextend
abilities.effect: When this model's attack rolls more successes than required to hit, it may convert one excess success into +1 damage OR +2" movement after the action. If it does, this model suffers -1 die on its next action.

abilities.name: Out of Nowhere
abilities.effect: Instead of activating normally, this unit may spawn from sand, ruins, or rubble terrain. Place the model touching the terrain feature. This counts as the unit's activation for the turn.

abilities.name: Panic Fire
abilities.effect: When this model is targeted by a melee attack, it may immediately make a ranged attack at -1 die. After resolving the attack, this model must test Morale. May only be used once per round.

abilities.name: Pass Judgment
abilities.effect: Once per game, target one enemy unit within 12". Until end of game, that unit suffers -1 to all Defense rolls and Liberty Corps units may reroll 1s when attacking it.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.effect: On a natural 6, bypass Defense entirely

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.effect: On a hit, the target cannot Move during its next activation. This effect does not stack or extend if applied multiple times.

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.effect: May attack first in melee if charged.

abilities.name: Random Movement
abilities.effect: At the start of this unit's activation, roll 1d8 or use scatter die to determine direction (1=NE, 2=E, 3=SE, 4=S, 5=SW, 6=W, 7=NW, 8=N), then move up to its Move stat in that direction. Stop if it contacts terrain/units or would move off the board. If forced off board, remove from play (counts as exited/fled).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: At start of activation, heal 1 wound on a 5+.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.effect: Ignores Pinned status. May always move full distance

abilities.name: Repair
abilities.effect: Action. If this unit has Spare Parts available, it may restore 1 damage to an adjacent friendly vehicle, device, or mechanical unit. This consumes 1 use of Spare Parts. Can also change state from Broken to Functional if applicable.

abilities.name: Rolling Fog
abilities.effect: Once per game: Place a Fog marker (3" radius) within 12". Fog blocks line of sight and prevents special actions (Hex, Charm, Inspire) from being used through it. Lasts until end of next round.

abilities.name: Runner
abilities.effect: May use Run action (double movement) without penalty. May still contest objectives after Running.

abilities.name: Scout
abilities.effect: May deploy up to 6" forward from deployment zone. Gains +1" to movement on first turn

abilities.name: Shield Aura
abilities.effect: Friendly units within 6" gain +1 Defense

abilities.name: Shield Wall
abilities.effect: Friendly units within 3" gain +1 Defense

abilities.name: Signal Orders
abilities.effect: Once per activation: One friendly unit within 12" may immediately move 3"

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.effect: Main Action. Range 12". Duration 2 rounds. Create a 12" radius zone of absolute silence centered on a point within range. While in Silent Zone: No sound can be made or heard, Radios do not function, Audio-based abilities (Inspire, Signal Orders, Rally, Command) cannot be used, Morale tests from Fear at -1 die, Monsters with hearing-based detection cannot sense units.

abilities.name: Skittish
abilities.effect: This model must test Morale the first time each round an enemy model enters within 4".

abilities.name: Slip Away
abilities.effect: May leave melee combat without penalty or free strikes

abilities.name: Sonderbar Injection
abilities.effect: Once per game, with adjacent Chemist Lackey, inject a Plugugly. Roll 1d6: 3-6 grants +2 Quality +1 Defense permanently, 1-2 transforms into enemy Sonderbar Ghoul

abilities.name: Sonic
abilities.effect: Attacks ignore Cover bonuses and can affect targets that are normally immune to physical damage. May cause Blinding/Deafening effects (scenario-specific).

abilities.name: Sonic Nullifier
abilities.effect: Enemy units within 6" cannot use Hex, Charm, or other Mystic special abilities

abilities.name: Stagger
abilities.effect: On a successful hit, the target loses 1" of movement and rolls -1 die on its next action. If the target is reduced to 0 Move, it may not Disengage this activation.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.effect: May use Interact action in base contact with enemy unit to attempt theft. On success, choose one: remove one non-Titan upgrade from target (upgrade is destroyed), steal 1 carried resource/token, or apply -1 Defense to target until end of round.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.effect: Enemies shooting from 9"+ suffer -1 to hit

abilities.name: Strain
abilities.effect: Using Unleashed Power causes 1 Strain. At 3 Strain, this unit may not use Unleashed Power until Strain is cleared (end of round or special ability).

abilities.name: Suppression
abilities.effect: On a hit, the target rolls -1 die on its next action (attack, ability, or Morale test).

abilities.name: Tough 1
abilities.effect: Roll 1 die when taking damage. On 5+, ignore 1 point of damage.

abilities.name: Tough 2
abilities.effect: Reduce incoming damage by 2 (minimum 1)

abilities.name: Tough 3
abilities.effect: Reduce incoming damage by 3 (minimum 1)

abilities.name: Tough 4
abilities.effect: Roll 4 dice when taking damage. On 5+, ignore 1 point of damage per success.

abilities.name: Tough 5
abilities.effect: Reduce incoming damage by 5 (minimum 1)

abilities.name: Triage Transfusion
abilities.effect: Action. An adjacent friendly unit gains +1 Quality (to a maximum of its starting Quality). This unit immediately loses 1 Quality.

abilities.name: Under Fire
abilities.effect: On successful ranged hit: target is Pinned AND suffers -1 Quality until end of its next activation.

abilities.name: Universal Terror
abilities.effect: When this unit fires its weapon: ALL units (friendly AND enemy) within 12" must test Morale.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.effect: Ranged magical attack using Wild Magic. Roll on Wild Magic Table (2d6) to determine effect. May cause Strain.

abilities.name: Unshakable
abilities.effect: Auto-passes all Morale checks. Ignores Dread effects.

abilities.name: Vengeful
abilities.effect: Each time this model loses one or more Quality from an enemy attack, it gains +1 bonus die on its next attack. This bonus stacks if Quality is lost multiple times before attacking, applies to one attack only, is cleared immediately after the attack, and may not increase dice rolled above the model's starting Quality.

abilities.name: Venom
abilities.effect: After this unit deals damage in melee, the target suffers 1 additional damage at the end of its next activation unless it is Bloodless or Automat.

abilities.name: Vitagood Brew
abilities.effect: Once per game. Action. This unit or an adjacent ally immediately restores 1 lost Quality and removes Suppression or Stagger or Venom.

abilities.name: Witch Stitching
abilities.effect: First time per activation this unit would lose Quality: 5+ ignore 1 damage

abilities.name: Witch-Stitched Clothing
abilities.effect: +1 Defense. Counts as Light Armor. Does not reduce movement or prevent Flying.

weapon_properties.name: AP 1
weapon_properties.effect: Armor Piercing: Ignore 1 point of Defense

weapon_properties.name: AP 2
weapon_properties.effect: Armor Piercing: Ignore 2 points of Defense

weapon_properties.name: AP 3
weapon_properties.effect: Armor Piercing: Ignore 3 points of Defense

weapon_properties.name: Blast 1
weapon_properties.effect: 1" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model in area

weapon_properties.name: Blast 2
weapon_properties.effect: 2" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model in area

weapon_properties.name: Blast 3
weapon_properties.effect: 3" radius area of effect. Roll separately for each model in area

weapon_properties.name: Blinding
weapon_properties.effect: On hit: target is Blinded until end of its next activation. While Blinded: cannot make ranged attacks, -2 dice on melee attacks, cannot use abilities requiring line of sight, move at half speed. An adjacent ally may use an action to clean ink/flash from a Blinded unit (removes Blinded status). Rain or water terrain immediately removes Blinded.

weapon_properties.name: Grapple
weapon_properties.effect: On hit, pull target 3-6" toward this unit. Target may not move next activation

weapon_properties.name: Ignores Cover
weapon_properties.effect: Attacks from this weapon ignore cover bonuses to Defense

weapon_properties.name: Pinning Shot
weapon_properties.effect: Target hit may not move next activation

weapon_properties.name: Quake
weapon_properties.effect: All models within 6" must pass Quality test or become Pinned

weapon_properties.name: Rapid Fire
weapon_properties.effect: May split attack dice between multiple targets within range

weapon_properties.name: Sonic
weapon_properties.effect: Ignores Heavy Armor bonus. Ignores cover bonuses to Defense. If at least 1 damage dealt, target tests Morale.

weapon_properties.name: Thrown 6 inches
weapon_properties.effect: May be thrown up to 6" as ranged attack, then used in melee

weapon_properties.name: Thrown 8 inches
weapon_properties.effect: May be thrown up to 8" as ranged attack, then used in melee

type_rules.name: Expendable Fodder
type_rules.effect: Do not grant Victory Points when destroyed. Do not generate Morale Loss when destroyed. May contest objectives even if outnumbered, but never control them. Destroyed Frail do not count toward activation advantage.

type_rules.name: Momentum
type_rules.effect: After inflicting at least 1 damage in melee, this unit may immediately move up to 2". This movement does not trigger reactions. This movement may not end in base contact with an enemy.

type_rules.name: Lingering Harm
type_rules.effect: Debuffs applied by this unit persist until the end of the target's next activation.

type_rules.name: Fire Superiority
type_rules.effect: If this unit did not move this activation, it may split its attack dice between up to two valid targets.

type_rules.name: Suppression Fragility
type_rules.effect: If this unit is Pinned or Grappled, it may not use Critical Damage abilities this activation.

type_rules.name: Disengage
type_rules.effect: After resolving an attack, this unit may disengage from melee without suffering penalties or free strikes.

type_rules.name: First Strike
type_rules.effect: When charged or charging, this unit attacks first. If both units have First Strike, resolve simultaneously.

type_rules.name: Bodyguard
type_rules.effect: May intercept attacks targeting adjacent friendly units. Roll Defense for intercepted attack.

type_rules.name: Unstoppable
type_rules.effect: Ignores difficult terrain. Cannot be Grappled or Pinned by units smaller than Brute.

type_rules.name: Rally
type_rules.effect: Once per round, may grant an ally within 12" +1 die on their next Morale test.

type_rules.name: Command Presence
type_rules.effect: Friendly units within 6" may use this unit's Quality for Morale tests instead of their own (if higher).

type_rules.name: High-Value Target
type_rules.effect: If this unit is destroyed, enemy gains +2 VP.

type_rules.name: High-Value Target
type_rules.effect: If this unit is destroyed, enemy gains +3 VP.

protective_gear.name: Gas Mask
protective_gear.effect: Protective eyewear and respirator. Immune to Coffin Cough environmental penalty and Blinding effects (like Ink Bomb).

armor.name: Witch-Stitched
armor.effect: Magical armor woven into clothing. Grants Heavy Armor (+2 Defense dice) with no movement penalty. Available to those trained by or allied with Conjure Guard mystics.

vehicle_upgrades.name: Extra Storage
vehicle_upgrades.effect: Additional cargo rigging. Increase capacity by +2 small monsters OR +1 objective.

mechanic_tools.name: Spare Parts
mechanic_tools.effect: Carry field supplies. Permission to repair mechanical vehicles, devices, or beings.

consumables.name: Pocket Snacks
consumables.effect: Once per game, when this unit attempts a Befriend action against a creature of a Monster Type it is trained to Befriend, it may use Pocket Snacks. Using Pocket Snacks consumes the item immediately. The Befriend attempt is delayed: Round 1 is spent feeding, placating, or preparing the creature. In Round 2, resolve the Befriend roll normally. If the result is a tie, treat it as a win for the Ranger. Pocket Snacks have no effect on Peerless creatures.

wild_magic_table.name: Wild Magic Table
wild_magic_table.description: Roll 2d6 when using Unleashed Power. Used by Mystics and magic-wielding units.

results.name: Catastrophic Backfire
results.effect: Caster takes 2 damage and is Stunned. All allies within 3" take 1 damage.

results.name: Wild Surge
results.effect: Target takes +1 damage. Roll again on this table (ignore further 3s).

results.name: Unstable Discharge
results.effect: Target takes 1 damage. Caster takes 1 Strain.

results.name: Flickering Power
results.effect: Target takes 1 damage. Effect is delayed until next activation.

results.name: Perfect Channeling
results.effect: Target takes 2 damage. No Strain on caster.

results.name: Empowered Strike
results.effect: Target takes 2 damage. Ignore armor/Defense bonuses.

results.name: Chain Lightning
results.effect: Target takes 2 damage. One adjacent enemy takes 1 damage.

results.name: Crystal Resonance
results.effect: Target takes 3 damage. Caster may immediately Channel again at -1d6.

results.name: Thyr Overcharge
results.effect: Target takes 4 damage. All allies within 6" gain +1 die on next action.

faction_features.name: Monster Escort
faction_features.effect: Rangers gain bonus VP for successfully escorting Monsters to safety

faction_features.name: Arrest and Extract
faction_features.effect: Agency M scores VP by arresting (via Binding Rig) and extracting units via Black Mariah

composition_requirements.note: Extraction-focused faction. Build for speed and survivability, not prolonged combat.

faction_features.name: Extraction Specialists
faction_features.effect: All Shine Riders units gain +1 die when performing Interact actions to extract Thyr or turn buildings.

faction_features.name: Quick Exit
faction_features.effect: Shine Riders units within 6" of a table edge gain +1 to Disengage rolls.

faction_features.name: Silver Rush
faction_features.effect: Earn bonus Silver for each building successfully turned and held until end of game.

victory_objectives.description: Control a turned building at end of game
Successfully extract and hold 3+ Thyr crystals
End game with all units within 6" of table edge (minimum 3 units surviving)

weapons.description: Weapons can be equipped by units and provide mechanical effects. Weapons may grant abilities from the abilities list, have special properties, or provide bonuses to stats. Cost is added to the unit's total point cost.

melee.name: Hatchet
melee.description: Versatile tool and weapon. Can be thrown or used in melee. Standard Monster Ranger equipment.

melee.name: Heavy Hatchet
melee.description: Heavier throwing axe with armor-piercing capability but shorter range.

melee.name: Heavy Wrench
melee.description: Large tool used by Clocktalker Mechanics. Doubles as improvised weapon with stunning force.

melee.name: Thrice-Blessed Shovel
melee.description: Consecrated digging tool of Skull Rangers. Each successful hit deals extra damage.

melee.name: Electro-Trident
melee.description: Crackling undersea weapon. Ignores 1 point of armor.

ranged.name: Service Revolver
ranged.description: Standard issue firearm, common for police and soldiers in the United States of Liberty.

ranged.name: Stub Gun
ranged.description: Oversized pistol scaled to massive PlugUgly hands. Capacity: 2 fat stub rounds before reloading.

ranged.name: Untergang Revolver
ranged.description: Deluxe Stub Gun with superior machining and armor-piercing rounds. Capacity: 2 rounds.

ranged.name: Slingshot
ranged.description: Simple but effective ranged weapon. Cargo Tiger Porters are deadly accurate despite low Quality.

ranged.name: Harpoons
ranged.description: Heavy projectiles for sea hunting. Used by Brine Divers. Optional upgrade.

special.name: Hex Bolts
special.description: Mystical energy projectiles that weaken targets (-1 Quality until end of next activation).

special.name: Ritual Implements
special.description: Tools for conducting mystical rites and ceremonies. Used in melee when necessary.

special.name: Arcane Staff
special.description: Focus for mystical power. Required to channel relic abilities.

special.name: Calamity Flag
special.description: Massive banner on 19ft pole. Projects morale-boosting aura and enables Radiomancer abilities.

special.name: Ramming Bumper
special.description: Heavy frontal armor on Cargo Tiger Trucks. Can pull enemies toward the vehicle.
